sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AAV2 ITR (alternate)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Functional equivalent of wild-type AAV2 ITR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AAV2 ITR (alternate)
AAV2 ITR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AAV2 ITR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: inverted terminal repeat of adeno-associated virus serotype 2
vertebrate consensus sequence for strong initiation of translation (Kozak, 1987)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: vertebrate consensus sequence for strong initiation of translation (Kozak, 1987)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: nucleoplasmin NLS
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: nucleoplasmin NLS
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: bipartite nuclear localization signal from nucleoplasmin

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: pRS vectors, use to sequence yeast selectable marker
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pRS-marker
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pRS-marker
VP64
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: VP64
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: tetrameric repeat of the minimal activation domain of herpes simplex virus VP16 (Beerli et al., 1998)

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Vector C encodes pAAV-pMecp2-dSaCas9-VP64-spA-pU6-sgRNA (BsaI) transgenes for AAV packaging and expression of CRISPR activator in neurons.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: Vector C encodes pAAV-pMecp2-dSaCas9-VP64-spA-pU6-sgRNA (BsaI) transgenes for AAV packaging and expression of CRISPR activator in neurons

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: nuclear localization signal of SV40 (simian virus 40) large T antigen
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: SV40 NLS
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: SV40 NLS

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pAAV-pMecp2-dSaCas9-VP64-pU6-sgRNA was a gift from Chung Tin (Addgene plasmid # 158972 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:158972 ; RRID:Addgene_158972)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: U6 promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: RNA polymerase III promoter for human U6 snRNA
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: U6 promoter

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: Mecp2 promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: Mecp2 promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: promoter for selective expression in neurons (Adachi et al., 2005; Gray et al., 2011)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: f1 bacteriophage origin of replication; arrow indicates direction of (+) strand synthesis

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:modificationsToBackbone: replaced CMV promoter with pMecp2; replace bGHpA with spA; replaced SaCas9 with dSaCas9-VP64

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: Sa gRNA scaffold
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: guide RNA scaffold for the Staphylococcus aureus CRISPR/Cas9 system
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: Sa gRNA scaffold
